title: Cross-border biosecurity compliance
text: Cross-border biosecurity compliance. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. We apply rotational grazing protocols for pasture recovery. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. We record yields and monitor feed intake. Telemetry from precision agriculture guides irrigation decisions. I check the crops to see if the plants are healthy. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. We sell fresh vegetables at the local market.
